mapper.sql: a.id AS userId, a.companyName AS companyName, a.startDate AS startDate, a.endDate AS endDate, a.agentLevelId AS agentLevelId, a.state AS state, a.create_date AS createDate, a.remarks AS remarks, a.certificate AS certificate
c.id AS userIdP, c.companyName AS companyNameP, c.startDate AS startDateP, c.endDate AS endDateP, c.agentLevelId AS agentLevelIdP, c.state AS stateP
mapper.select: SELECT ,a.packageDiscount AS packageDiscount,a.publicDiscount AS publicDiscount,a.minaDiscount AS minaDiscount, a.publicAccount AS publicAccount,a.minaAccount AS minaAccount,a.hardwareAccount AS hardwareAccount,a.vipAccount AS vipAccount, b.name AS agentLevel, ,c.packageDiscount AS packageDiscountP,c.publicDiscount AS publicDiscountP,c.minaDiscount AS minaDiscountP, d.name AS agentLevelP FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN was_agent_level b on a.agentLevelId=b.agentLevelId LEFT JOIN sys_user c on a.companyParentId=c.id LEFT JOIN was_agent_level d on c.agentLevelId=d.agentLevelId where a.id=#{0}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET remarks=#{remarks}, state=3 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.companyName FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role b on b.user_id=a.id LEFT JOIN sys_role c on c.id=b.role_id LEFT JOIN was_agent_level d on d.roleId=c.id WHERE a.state=1 and a.del_flag='0' and c.del_flag='0' and d.delegateAgent=0 GROUP BY a.id
SELECT a.name,a.agentLevelId,a.salesPolicyIds,a.delegateAgent FROM was_agent_level a where a.state=1
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_user a where binary a.companyName=#{0}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user( id, login_name, password, name, email, mobile, companyName, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, login_flag, del_flag, state, qq, wechat, packageDiscount, publicDiscount, minaDiscount, companyParentId, companyParentIds, agentLevelId, customerLevel, startDate, endDate, certificate, address, province, city, county, theater, principal, cashPledge ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{login_name}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{companyName}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{login_flag}, #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}, #{state}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{packageDiscount}, #{publicDiscount}, #{minaDiscount}, #{companyParentId}, #{companyParentIds}, #{agentLevelId}, #{customerLevel}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{certificate}, #{address}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{theater}, #{principal}, #{cashPledge} )
